lead_paragraph: TSURUOKA--Theodore. Temple Isaiah of Great Neck notes with great sorrow the passing of our beloved Rabbi, Theodore Tsuruoka. Rabbi Ted was our spiritual leader and our friend. May his memory be for a blessing. Board of Directors, Temple Isaiah 1/3
